arts.ttl: Nuno not getting carried away as Forest strengthen grip on Champions League spot
arts.sum: Nuno Espirito Santo labelled Morgan Gibbs-White a ‘huge talent’ after he grabbed an assist following his England snub.

arts.ttl: Ramon Sosa delivers shocking Instagram message after latest Nottingham Forest snub
Six-minute spell of 'very, very bad goals' cost Ipswich - McKenna
arts.sum: Ipswich manager Kieran McKenna is frustrated his side conceded a flurry of "very, very bad goals" in the 4-2 defeat by Nottingham Forest at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest fans have a lot to say about Elliot Anderson after 4-2 win over Ipswich Town
arts.sum: He was everywhere at Portman Road!

arts.ttl: Ipswich 2-4 Nottingham Forest: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Nuno Espirito Santo closes in on Arsenal
arts.sum: Anthony Elanga bags a brace as Nottingham Forest move to within one point of second-placed Arsenal in the Premier League table with a 4-2 win over Ipswich Town.

arts.ttl: Forest's quickfire treble in victory leaves Ipswich in big trouble
arts.sum: Ipswich's Premier League survival hopes were dashed as three goals in a ruthless seven-minute spell earned Nottingham Forest a 4-2 win at Portman Road to leave their hosts effectively 10 points from safety.

arts.ttl: Anthony Elanga brace helps Forest see off Ipswich and boost Champions League bid
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest made the most of Man City being held at home by Brighton in the race for a top-four finish.
